label: Great Pyramid of Giza Completed
description: Construction of the Great Pyramid completed during reign of Pharaoh Khufu

label: Code of Hammurabi
description: One of the oldest deciphered writings of significant length in the world

label: Trojan War Begins
description: Legendary war between Greeks and Trojans (~1194-1184 BCE), as told in Homer's Iliad

label: Traditional Founding of Rome
description: Legendary founding of Rome by Romulus and Remus

label: First Olympic Games
description: Traditional date of the first Olympic Games held at Olympia, Greece

label: Alexander the Great Becomes King
description: Macedonian king who created one of the largest empires in ancient history (336-323 BCE)

label: Assassination of Julius Caesar
description: Roman dictator Julius Caesar was stabbed to death by senators on the Ides of March

label: Death of Cleopatra
description: Last active ruler of the Ptolemaic Kingdom of Egypt died, ending Egyptian independence
